welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vitry-sur-Seine, a charming city known for its vibrant street art and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy exploring all that this beautiful city has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals serving a mix of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport with unlimited access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
